code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{placeBet}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BetForm=_ref=>{let{eventId}=_ref;const[choice,setChoice]=useState('');const[amount,setAmount]=useState(0);const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();await placeBet(eventId,choice,amount);alert('Aposta realizada com sucesso!');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Fazer Aposta"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Escolha",value:choice,onChange:e=>setChoice(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",placeholder:"Quantia (em wei)",value:amount,onChange:e=>setAmount(Number(e.target.value))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Apostar"})]});};export default BetForm;
